description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports: the Business and Development Exchange (BDX) a flagship research partnership between the former AusAID and the Overseas Development Institute (ODI) which focused on private sector development in Indonesia, Papua New Guinea, Vietnam and Burma; provision of analysis for country and thematic areas supporting private sector development and aid for trade; research on skills development and business engagement in agriculture in Vietnam and Burma aimed at enhancing economic benefits to smallholder farmers from agricultural production, skills development and vocational education; business roundtable events; and sponsoring a workshop in Southeast Asia to support the development and expansion of the Services Trade Restrictiveness Index to the region. The total value of this initiative is $0.4 million to be expensed during the 2013-14 financial year.
